text: Final Exam • Thursday, May 2th from 11:30 am to 2:30pm in JROWL 2C22. • Topics: Classes 15-24 (Electrodynamics), Sections covered in chapters 7 to 11. • Exam format: problem solving on paper using a pen • Reference material allowed: Very Useful Mathematical Formulas and Legendre Polynominals And Their Important Properties. • 4-5 problems
